alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Emanuel, northeastern Johnson and south central Jefferson Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Kite, or 11 miles northwest of Swainsboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Wadley, Bartow, Kite, Meeks, Blundale and Dellwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
